LanguageData.EM_HarvestBlood.label: harvest humanoid blood
LanguageData.EM_HarvestBlood.description: Harvest the blood from a humanoid.
LanguageData.EM_HarvestSaB.label: harvest humanoid skull and blood
LanguageData.EM_HarvestSaB.description: Harvest the skull and blood from a humanoid. Produces drastically less blood than just harvesting blood alone.
LanguageData.EM_HarvestSkull.label: harvest humanoid skull
LanguageData.EM_HarvestSkull.description: Harvest the skull from a humanoid.
